Key Match Events: Durant led the team in scoring with 25 points
Beal and Booker had 24 and 15 points respectively
Clippers' James Harden led with 29 points and 12 rebounds
Ivica Zubac had 21 points and nine rebounds
The Suns won in overtime with a score of 116-113
Pre-Game Insights: Paul George is unavailable due to offseason loss
Kawhi Leonard is out with ongoing knee issues
Phoenix Suns have a new head coach, Mike Budenholzer
Post-Match Reflections: Kevin Durant expressed focus on the season ahead
Phoenix Suns owner Matt Ishbia reiterated commitment to keeping Durant long-term
Miscellaneous Highlights: Clippers lost Paul George during the offseason
Suns acquired Durant from the Nets in a high-profile trade
